name: Quality Television
description:
In the distant future of 20XX, you are imprisoned by a ruthless dictatorship! You have only one weapon: a television. Use this television to hypnotize the guards, facilitating your escape through 12 tricky levels!

This game was made with the MegaZeux game engine. You can find MegaZeux's source code here: https://github.com/AliceLR/megazeux
